title: Tribute Page
textCopy:
This HTML and CSS project is more than just a static information page, its also a learning experience that aims to inspire and educate on the life of Dr. Norman Borlaugh.

Using the power of HTML & CSS, this certification project aims to create a visually pleasing design and narrative that highlights the life of Dr. Borlaugh, his contributions to agriculture, and his profound impact on the world.
